message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I think you'll find it's a very good deal at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
I understand your position, Bob, but I can't sell the product for less than $110.  It's still a very competitive offer considering its value.
I see, Alice. I am still interested in purchasing the product, but I am only able to offer $105.
